item.title: Can I receive bitcoin on any of my wallet addresses?
item.description:
Can I receive bitcoin on any of my wallet addresses?

Can i receive bitcoin to any wallet addresses from it ? because i have more wallet addresses on coinbase it is every day change it .. How can i turning off this choice ? Thanks for help ..

item.title: A Conversation with Gene Kavner, CEO of iPayYou
item.description:
A Conversation with Gene Kavner, CEO of iPayYou

iPayYou is a new service that offers what is touted as the easiest, safest and most useful bitcoin wallet in the world. The Seattle-based company's wallet lets users hold, purchase, sell, send and ...

item.title: Bitcoin News for the week of 5/16/16
item.description:
Bitcoin News for the week of 5/16/16

Welcome to our weekly bitcoin news recap, where we cover top headlines and stories in the world of bitcoin each week. This was a huge week for Blockchain with the launch of the Thunder Network, which was carried by several mainstream media outlets including TechCrunch and Forbes.

item.title: Merchant tool that will dynamically adjust the # of required confirmations based on network hashrate data
item.description:
Merchant tool that will dynamically adjust the # of required confirmations based on network hashrate data

Satoshi built Bitcoin to be a decentralized network. Some of the original recommendations (such as waiting for 6 confirmations) relied on statistics that related to level of decentralization.

item.title: Are there private blockchains that do not require mining fees that small developers can play with?
item.description:
Are there private blockchains that do not require mining fees that small developers can play with?

item.title: Why GDAX CEO Brian Armstrong Is Not Turning His Back on Bitcoin
item.description:
Why GDAX CEO Brian Armstrong Is Not Turning His Back on Bitcoin

While these comments have not sparked any significant debate over the past five to six weeks, they are popping up once again now that GBAX will add support for Ethereum. The Coinbase exchange platform will be going through several changes over the coming months, as they will rebrand to GDAX and add two new cryptocurrencies.

item.title: Wladimir's new GPG key
item.description:
Wladimir's new GPG key

I just went to install the latest version of bitcoind and discovered that Wladimir has signed the https://bitcoin.org/bin/bitcoin-core-0.12.1/SHA256SUMS.asc file with a new GPG key:

item.title: New Regulatory Proposal By SEC May Affect Bitcoin ETFs
item.description:
New Regulatory Proposal By SEC May Affect Bitcoin ETFs

A study has been conducted regarding the role of market makers in operating and trading ETFs over the past few years, as well as investors' understanding of these vehicles. The SEC is taking a very close look at all exchange-traded funds, and they might impose "enhanced attention" rules.

item.title: Греф предрек России технологический регресс из-за запрета на обмен биткоинов
item.description:
Греф предрек России технологический регресс из-за запрета на обмен биткоинов

Введение в России уголовной ответственности за обмен биткоинов приведет к остановке развития перспективной технологии blockchain в стране и регрессу в целом. Такое мнение высказал глава Сбербанка Герман Греф. Российские специалисты будут вынуждены работать в других юрисдикциях, считает он.

item.title: Sydney Stock Exchange to Implement Blockchain Tech With Bit Trade Labs - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Sydney Stock Exchange to Implement Blockchain Tech With Bit Trade Labs - NEWSBTC

Sydney Stock Exchange has recently announced that it will be implementing blockchain based trade settlement and clearance system in association with Bit Trade Labs. Read more... Sydney Stock Exchange has recently announced that it will be implementing blockchain technology for its equities market settlement and registration system.
